author: noelgrandin
msg: fix use of braces in if statements, use IllegalArgumentException instead of IllegalStateException

author: isabel
msg: MAHOUT-138 - marked optional options as optional.

author: tabish
msg: Change to make the nextCommandId an int instead of a short to prevent quickly exhausting the available set of command Ids before the broker has processed large batches of messages.  Also changed the Id increment to use the Interlocked increment instead of a mutex.

author: slaws
msg: Add remote default binding back into web services feature
